Key Match Events: The Trail Blazers led wire to wire in a 119-100 victory over the Pelicans
Anfernee Simons scored 17 points and Toumani Camara 15 for Portland
CJ McCollum scored 23 points and Dejounte Murray 20 for New Orleans
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans played without power forward Zion Williamson and Brandon Ingram (left ankle)
Others: Herb Jones left the game in the third quarter because of a right shoulder injury
